name: Arcade Fight
description:
Controls (desktop):

  • Move with WASD or the arrow keys.
  • Shoot with left click or space
  • Use the Super with right click

Controls (mobile):

  • Press and move the blue button to the left to move
  • Press and aim the red button to the right to shoot
  • Press and aim the yellow "S" button to aim your Super

This game is part of a series of videos where I make games with different programming languages. This one in particular is made with Nelua, a systems programming language which looks a lot like Lua.

Check the source code here!
